name: Sinful Souls
description:
Install instructions

The Seven Deadly Sins. Since time immemorial mankind has struggled against their dark influence. Luckily there are those who would rise up against this occultish evil - those who seek to exorcise the evil from the world. 

The sins have recently taken root in a small town and have taken command of the dead, preventing those who've gone from finding rest. Go forth, and restore the peace once more!
